column1: Tojo Cane Counter Stool W/ Cushion
column6:
Bring breezy tropical flair to the kitchen island or breakfast nook with this counter Stool. 

Natural cane frame emanates soothing seaside vibes while its soft white cushion ensures comfortably peaceful dining.

Weight Capacity: 275 lbs.
Country: Indonesia
Seat Dimensions (W*D*H): 18.11" x 22.64" x 23.62"
Assembly Required: No

column1: Avignon Paris Bistro Counter Stool, White/ Gray
column6: Croissant? Café au lait? Mais, oui! Enjoy the charms and comforts of a Parisian cafe with the Avignon Paris bistro counter stool. The frame is bent rattan wrapped in an all-weather, family friendly weave that stands up to everyday use. Fully assembled.

column1: Avignon Paris Bistro Counter Stool, Black *New*
column6: Croissant? Café au lait? Mais, oui! Enjoy the charms and comforts of a Parisian cafe with the Avignon Paris bistro counter stool. The frame is bent rattan wrapped in an all-weather, family friendly weave that stands up to everyday use. Fully assembled. Available in Black and White/Gray.

Hampton Chairs and Barstools are handcrafted of solid oak in a modernized version of Thomas Chippendale’s Chinoiserie style. The pretty back features carved faux bamboo fretwork. Other great details include faux bamboo frames, legs that nip out in the front and four decorative stretchers. Simple drop-in linen upholstery recovers easily and beachy, limed oak finishes bring nature indoors.

17w x 21d x 40h
Limed Oak Finish
Linen Drop-In Cushion in Natural (Photo is for reference only, actual color can vary widely from lot to lot)
Depending on Repeat 1/2 to 1 Yard of Fabric to Upholster

The Kara rattan collection includes this 27" seat height counter stool. A reproduction from the original master cabinet maker featuring Chinese Chippendale style design inspired by pagoda motifs with visually appealing diagonal lines. Fully assembled, available in Paloma Brown, White or Gray. Removable seat cushion.

column1: Leda Rattan Counter Stool, 17.72" X 25.2", Honey Brown
column6: Designed to bring warmth, texture and style to the contemporary interior, this rattan counter stool is an investment. Crafted with natural mindi wood, its honey brown finish complements any open plan dining area. Designers love its gently curved seat. Seat Dimensions: 18.10" x 14.20" x 25.60", Leg Height: 23.6". Dust regularly with a soft, dry cloth. Never use oiled or treated cloths on lacquered finishes. Some finishes can be wiped with a damp (not wet) cloth, followed at once by rubbing with a dry cloth to remove fingerprints and smudges. For persistent spots, gently clean with a soft cloth and a solution of water and mild soap, make sure to wipe dry. Use adhesive felt pads, coasters and placemats to protect your furniture.

Boho-Chic in 24" seat height counter stool an all-time favorite! The gently curving saddle seat sits atop thick bent rattan frame for style and sturdiness. Fully assembled, available in Canary Brown, White and Black frame. Joints are wrapped in Brown tone rattan peel binding for an appealing contrast.

column1: Capri Counter Stool, 20" X 27.1", Natural Teak/White Leather
column6: For those who want a breezy ambiance in their kitchen or dining room décor, the Capri Counter Stool is the high-style solution. Capri is crafted of smooth teak in a rich natural finish that perfectly supports a seat of white leather bands, ideal for bringing beach-like relaxation to any dining experience. Seat Dimensions: 17.70" x 15.30" x 27.10", Leg Height: 27.1", Fill Material: Leather. Protect leather from direct sunlight and sources of heat to prevent colour fading, keep away from fire, for general cleaning only use a dry soft clot if necessary, wipe or lightly rub the whole surface with a clean, soft cloth.
